about_the_game:
【Warning】

※Note that this game is suitable for players who like grotesque and Ryona.
※This game was born based on the idea of ​​"continuing to do cruel things to girls in a mechanical and assembly line mode"!
Although it is a very cruel idea, if you resonate with it, please be sure to play it and give it a try!
 
 

【How to play】

◼︎Seize the moment and press the button to cut, then use your mouse to drag and drop the cut part into the furnace!

 

◼︎There are four types of materials that can be broken down and recycled.

  • If it's iron, just throw it into the furnace, but if the Bio-Girl is still alive, it will struggle, so kill it first.

  • If you want more detailed parts, completely disassemble the Bio-Girl.

  • If blood is needed, draw blood. Just chop off the head and draw blood from the neck part.

  • If you want money, sell. If you sell it, it doesn't matter what state the Bio-Girl is in.

 

◼︎Every time a quota is achieved, the level of the workshop will increase accordingly, and the things that can be done and the status of Bio-Girls entering the factory will also change accordingly.

Starting from level 2, if a Bio-Girl you like is sent to you, you can also play lewd pranks on them.
But don’t overdo it and fail to achieve your quota.

After further leveling up, living Bio-Girls will be sent to the factory.
Living Bio-Girls will resist and move around, and the difficulty will increase accordingly, but as long as you survive one more level, you can obtain firearms. In this way, if there is a disobedient Bio-GIrl, just shoot her in the head.

 

After leveling up and clearing the game,
This is when the real game begins.

 

◼︎After unlocking the "hidden room", you can imprison and play with your favorite Bio-Girls!

Finally, you can also use petrification to preserve them!
 
 

◼︎In order to satisfy the various hobbies of players, the game provides as many diverse choices as possible.

  • There are three face shapes for each body type.

  • Each body type has two breast sizes.

  • There are three hairstyles to choose from for each face shape.

  • There are two eye colors and two hair colors for each face shape and hairstyle.

  • Clothing and jewelry also have their own variations.

 

 ——Come on, let’s get to work!

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains adult content, including non-consensual sex, rape, amputation, dismemberment, sexual harassment, necrophilia, and BDSM.

※Note that this game is suitable for players who like grotesque and Ryona.

Although it is a very cruel idea, if you resonate with it, please be sure to play it and give it a try!

name: Dismantling Workshop of Bio-Girl

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10/11
  • Processor: 2+ GHz Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration. (AMD Catalyst 10.9, nVidia 358.50)
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

steam_germany.descriptors:
Sexualisierte Gewalt / Sexual violence
Drastische Gewalt

short_description: Recruiting: Bio Girl (female robot) recycling worker! From now on, kill Bio-Girl girl every day!
supported_languages: Japanese, English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
